amendment.description: Amendment directs the Inspector General of the Intelligence Community to review available intelligence, including raw and unfinished intelligence, to determine if there is any credible evidence of a connection between a foreign entity and the attacks on the United States in 2001 involving anthrax.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 111-419 to direct the Inspector General of the Intelligence Community to review available intelligence, including raw and unfinished intelligence, to determine if there is any credible evidence of a connection between a foreign entity and the attacks on the United States in 2001 involving anthrax.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
